summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 2, C. P. Stone's Home Addition, and portion of Tracts 22 and 25, Replat of Sander's Acre Tracts, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto, two new sections numbered 2-213 and 17-159, respectively.
